00026 extern "C" {

00034 #include <poll.h>
00035 #if defined(__linux__)
00036 #include <sys/epoll.h>
00037 #if !defined(POLLRDHUP)
00038 #define POLLRDHUP 0x2000
00039 #endif
00040 #endif
00041 }

00043 #include "Common/Logger.h"

00050 namespace Hypertable {
00051 
00055   class IOHandler : public ReferenceCount {
00056 
00057   public:
00058 
00059     IOHandler(int sd, const sockaddr_in &addr, DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp)
00060       : m_free_flag(0), m_addr(addr), m_sd(sd), m_dispatch_handler_ptr(dhp) {
00061       ReactorFactory::get_reactor(m_reactor_ptr);
00062       m_poll_interest = 0;
00063       socklen_t namelen = sizeof(m_local_addr);
00064       getsockname(m_sd, (sockaddr *)&m_local_addr, &namelen);
00065       memset(&m_alias, 0, sizeof(m_alias));
00066     }
00067 
00068 #if defined(__APPLE__)
00069     virtual bool handle_event(struct kevent *event, clock_t arrival_clocks) = 0;
00070 #elif defined(__linux__)
00071     virtual bool handle_event(struct epoll_event *event,
00072                               clock_t arrival_clocks) = 0;
00073 #else
00074     ImplementMe;
00075 #endif
00076 
00077     virtual ~IOHandler() {
00078       HT_EXPECT(m_free_flag != 0xdeadbeef, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00079       m_free_flag = 0xdeadbeef;
00080       return;
00081     }
00082 
00083     void deliver_event(Event *event) {
00084       memcpy(&event->local_addr, &m_local_addr, sizeof(m_local_addr));
00085       if (!m_dispatch_handler_ptr) {
00086         HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00087         delete event;
00088       }
00089       else {
00090         EventPtr event_ptr(event);
00091         m_dispatch_handler_ptr->handle(event_ptr);
00092       }
00093     }
00094 
00095     void deliver_event(Event *event, DispatchHandler *dh) {
00096       memcpy(&event->local_addr, &m_local_addr, sizeof(m_local_addr));
00097       if (!dh) {
00098         if (!m_dispatch_handler_ptr) {
00099           HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00100           delete event;
00101         }
00102         else {
00103           EventPtr event_ptr(event);
00104           m_dispatch_handler_ptr->handle(event_ptr);
00105         }
00106       }
00107       else {
00108         EventPtr event_ptr(event);
00109         dh->handle(event_ptr);
00110       }
00111     }
00112 
00113     void start_polling() {
00114 #if defined(__APPLE__)
00115       add_poll_interest(Reactor::READ_READY);
00116 #elif defined(__linux__)
00117       struct epoll_event event;
00118       memset(&event, 0, sizeof(struct epoll_event));
00119       event.data.ptr = this;
00120       if (ReactorFactory::ms_epollet) {
00121         event.events = EPOLLIN | EPOLLOUT | POLLRDHUP | EPOLLET;
00122         if (epoll_ctl(m_reactor_ptr->poll_fd, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, m_sd, &event)
00123             < 0) {
00124           HT_ERRORF("epoll_ctl(%d, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, %d, EPOLLIN|EPOLLOUT|"
00125                     "POLLRDHUP|EPOLLET) failed : %s", m_reactor_ptr->poll_fd,
00126                     m_sd, strerror(errno));
00127           exit(1);
00128         }
00129       }
00130       else {
00131         event.events = EPOLLIN;
00132         if (epoll_ctl(m_reactor_ptr->poll_fd, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, m_sd, &event)
00133             < 0) {
00134           HT_ERRORF("epoll_ctl(%d, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, %d, EPOLLIN) failed : %s",
00135                     m_reactor_ptr->poll_fd, m_sd, strerror(errno));
00136           exit(1);
00137         }
00138       }
00139       m_poll_interest |= Reactor::READ_READY;
00140 #endif
00141     }
00142 
00143     void add_poll_interest(int mode);
00144 
00145     void remove_poll_interest(int mode);
00146 
00147     struct sockaddr_in &get_address() { return m_addr; }
00148 
00149     struct sockaddr_in &get_local_address() { return m_local_addr; }
00150 
00151     void get_local_address(struct sockaddr_in *addrp) {
00152       memcpy(addrp, &m_local_addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00153     }
00154 
00155     void set_alias(const sockaddr_in &alias) {
00156       memcpy(&m_alias, &alias, sizeof(m_alias));
00157     }
00158 
00159     void get_alias(sockaddr_in *aliasp) {
00160       memcpy(aliasp, &m_alias, sizeof(m_alias));
00161     }
00162 
00163     int get_sd() { return m_sd; }
00164 
00165     void get_reactor(ReactorPtr &reactor_ptr) { reactor_ptr = m_reactor_ptr; }
00166 
00167     void shutdown() {
00168       ExpireTimer timer;
00169       m_reactor_ptr->schedule_removal(this);
00170       boost::xtime_get(&timer.expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00171       timer.expire_time.nsec += 200000000LL;
00172       timer.handler = 0;
00173       m_reactor_ptr->add_timer(timer);
00174     }
00175 
00176   protected:
00177 
00178     void stop_polling() {
00179 #if defined(__APPLE__)
00180       remove_poll_interest(Reactor::READ_READY|Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00181 #elif defined(__linux__)
00182       struct epoll_event event;  // this is necessary for < Linux 2.6.9
00183       if (epoll_ctl(m_reactor_ptr->poll_fd, EPOLL_CTL_DEL, m_sd, &event) < 0) {
00184         HT_ERRORF("epoll_ctl(%d, EPOLL_CTL_DEL, %d) failed : %s",
00185                      m_reactor_ptr->poll_fd, m_sd, strerror(errno));
00186         exit(1);
00187       }
00188       m_poll_interest = 0;
00189 #endif
00190     }
00191 
00192     uint32_t            m_free_flag;
00193     InetAddr            m_addr;
00194     InetAddr            m_local_addr;
00195     InetAddr            m_alias;
00196     int                 m_sd;
00197     DispatchHandlerPtr  m_dispatch_handler_ptr;
00198     ReactorPtr          m_reactor_ptr;
00199     int                 m_poll_interest;
00200 
00201 #if defined(__APPLE__)
00202     void display_event(struct kevent *event);
00203 #elif defined(__linux__)
00204     void display_event(struct epoll_event *event);
00205 #endif
00206   };
00207   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<IOHandler> IOHandlerPtr;
00208 
00209   struct ltiohp {
00210     bool operator()(const IOHandlerPtr &p1, const IOHandlerPtr &p2) const {
00211       return p1.get() < p2.get();
00212     }
00213   };

00215 }
